content.question: In the second sentence of the second paragraph, the repetition of the word “things” primarily serves to

choices.label: qualify a claim by acknowledging an exception to it
clarify an argument by restating it in simpler terms
illustrate a generalization with a particular case
strengthen an assertion by broadening its implications

content.answer: strengthen an assertion by broadening its implications

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how the organization of a text creates unity and coherence and reflects a line of reasoning.
